preconditions.precondition: User is logged in and accessing the application

mainSequence.step: Frontend application requests facilities for selected waste types
Backend server queries facilities by waste type
Database returns a list of facilities
Backend server sends facilities and opening hours to frontend
Frontend displays facilities and opening hours to the user
User requests optimal route and schedule
Frontend calculates optimal route based on user location and facility hours
Backend returns optimal route and schedule to frontend
Frontend displays optimal route and schedule to the user
